overview: Molly Cooper is a Principal Solution Manager at Microsoft. Molly oversees the Project Management Office (PMO) and Change Management Office (CMO) for large scale, global IT programs. Prior to Microsoft, Molly was a business management consultant with Deloitte providing consulting services to fortune 500 clients. Molly received a B.A. in Business Administration from Washington State University. She lives in Irvine, California with her daughter and husband.
